item.title: By: Erin Stellato
item.dc:creator: Erin Stellato
item.content:encoded:
TED!!!! Thank you. ðŸ™‚ It is an honor to read your posts, and it makes me want to write my own thanking YOU, because for every post of yours I’ve read, I’m sure you’ve read two of mine.

I agree with Jes, it has been fun, and I have learned so much from you (and from Jes!)

Thank you for always encouraging – not just me, but all those with whom you interact in the SQL Server Community.

item.title: By: Jes Schultz Borland (grrlgeek)
item.dc:creator: Jes Schultz Borland (grrlgeek)
item.content:encoded:
Thanks, Ted! It’s been fun to help you and I’ve learned a TON.

I couldn’t agree more on getting help. Every writer should have a couple people to edit them. It keeps us honest and motivated!
